body_html: @dustinvtran I agree with your second point. As for the first, I have a more specific goal than generic usability, in that I am attempting to speed up a Sparse GP in GPflow that currently uses a vanilla python HMC. That said, the answer to 1 would be to infer all variables in the feed_dict(). More generally though, I see your point.
